Html:
As mentioned in the Installation Guide, I am trying to download "Newton Game Dynamics SDK 1.53" so that I can work with tutorials. However, I am not able to download as all the links are redirecting to http://newtondynamics.com/forum/newton.php only.
Please advise me how can I download this so that I can work with GoblinXNA or is there any other alternative available.

I try download and install this: https://newton-dynamics.googlecode.com/files/newton-dynamics-2.33.rar
and i take dll : newton-dynamics-2.33\packages\Win32\debugDll\newton.dll

but it have error on "NewtonSetWorldSize" in DLL "Newton.dll".


Please HELP HELP HELP.
I had this same issue and solved it by doing a search for "newtonwin-1.5.3.zip". The first search result which is some course notes archive worked for me.
